title: Basil Wolverton - Mr. Monsters Weird Tales Of The Future
description:
Mr. Monster's Super Duper Special ran on Eclipse Comics for eight issues from 1986-1987. Each book had a sub-name, for lack of a better term, and it was actually that sub-name that ran on the cover. Issue number eight of Mr. Monster's Super Duper Special was called Mr. Monsters Weird Tales Of The Future No. 1 Why they gave them two different numbers... who knows why? Honestly, this guys books kind of became a mess after his death. It would be nice if somebody did a massive omnibus collection (or two) of his work. For now we've at least got the ongoing life-story books that Fantagraphics are printing, of which the first volume is absolutely stellar.  

---------------------------------------------------------------

Mr. Monsters Weird Tales Of The Future No. 1 (or, Mr. Monster's Super Duper Special No. 8)

Eclipse Comics, 1987, 32 pages

Written and Illustrated by Basil Wolverton
